title: Having issues Patching 6.18? Click Here
body:
Hey all,

You might as well dig your own grave, cover yourself with dirt, and say your prayers. The Shepherd of Lost Souls has returned and we don't think he's here to hand out candy kisses. We'd say, "Do your best." but it wouldn't help. 

http://i.imgur.com/o3lAHNM.gif

But just because you're getting your face beat in with a shovel doesn't mean we want you to have patching issues. If you're having any problems check the solutions above or drop us your questions below. 

----------------------------------------------

>#***Files Scanned reaches over 9000!!!!! Or, 15k, 20k, etc***

The patcher needs to scan already installed files to make sure that none of the files are corrupt.  If it finds one, it replaces it and rescans the files.  This is why it can sometimes get as high as 20k, even though there aren't 20k files in the installation.  

**The best thing to do is let it scan files!**  If you restart the client, it may cause it to scan even more files.   The patcher will eventually stop scanning files, and it will patch normally afterward.

>#***Patcher never pops up, or disappears after you press "LAUNCH"***

This can be caused by corruption with the patcher itself or it failed to properly self-patch. Additionally, it may be due to some issues with the configuration of your computer system's permissions (meaning it can't properly save the files in the correct location). To resolve this, make sure to complete all the steps in our [Patching Issues Article](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434-Patching-Issues)!

>#***Patcher stops/errors out at 33%, Patcher fails at 99%, or a general "Unspecified Error has occurred" message***

These are usually connection related errors. Either your computer is unable to maintain a stable connection, or a 3rd party security program is blocking League of Legends from properly patching. Many of the most common Anti-virus programs [have already whitelisted LoL](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#wq3), however make sure to update yours to the latest version!

Also, even though you may have set specific exceptions in place before for your security program, League of Legends has gone through a major update. Therefore, your security program may recognize the old version of League of Legends, but not the new version. 

To get these issues resolved ASAP, make sure to go through our [Connection Issues Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)!

--------------------------------------------------------------

*If after completing these steps, and you still do not see the glorious orange 'LAUNCH' button, feel free to drop us a post in this thread!  Rioters will be on hand to respond and provide some additional help!*

replies.body: Hello all, I'm not sure if its the update on Yorick or if its something internally wrong at the moment with the game itself. But I recently tried to play two different matches. (One with a Yorick on my team and the second with him on the opposing team) Everything was fine in the loading screen, but once we got into the game and left the fountain the game froze. I shut down my computer and relogged into the server, but it didn't say reconnect so I'm guessing everyone got kicked out. if there's any tips on this going around feel free to let me know. Thanks for the read and have a good day fellow league players and rioters

Have you recently updated Windows 10?  Some players have been experiencing this freeze, and the culprit might be with the [Xbox Game Bar ](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) not interacting properly with league.  Disabling this should fix the issue!
It actually worked, thank you :)
And this is someone else having this same exact issue, im betting to say its Riot and not the users.

replies.poster: S R I J A N
replies.body: Yeah man u r right! I did all foxes in the whole universe but guess god doesnt wamt me to patch league:(

I can do everything, but play the game. I can go into the store, Watch my summoner profile....
I bought my computer 2 months ago and i already played with it, so my computer is able to run the game

My game is crashing in loading screen and it won't let me in until that game is over. This is the 6th time in 2 days and i'm not the only one, the gameplay section is ful of people complaining about the same issue.

I'ts not my internet, or my PC or my firewall, i checked previous posts already and everything is okay, this has to be something related to the last patch.

EDIT: Restarting my PC is the only way to reconnect to the game, if there's anyone else having this problem, try restarting you PC.
Have the same bug. I try to reconnect, but nothing. And when I finally reconnect, the game is over and a got the BuzzerLeaver. It's already 3 times I have this.
Try restarting you PC, it worked for me last time and i could reconnect to it.
how is it I  get a leave buster 20 min que when my client states its corrupted and will not let me into a game.  I submit the bug splat this doesn't not seem fair to me.
Ever since I patched to 6.18, my game client keeps crashing as I'm trying to load into Champ Select.

As soon as i enter any game (this has happened 3 times already) when the pregame loading screen is supposed to pop up it never does. Im stuck looking at a black screen and when i alt tab out it says my game crashed. Ive uninstalled 3 times and nothing has changed. It all started when i was playing one for all and mid game it said attempting to reconnect. Rito pls help me idk what to do. Ive also tried using the hex tech repair tool and it said nothing was wrong. I even got leaver buster for this which is insanely unfair
My league of legends client is stuck updating at 73% saying "applying patches" and the update hasn't progressed since. What can I do? It is on a mac btw.

I was having issues with connecting to the pvp.net servers for about 3 hours and tried everything that was recommended.  Finally after repairing and reinstalling and having command prompt mastered basically, I found a tiny youtube channel that had the fix.  Basically "ipconfig/release" then "ipconfig/renew" then "ipconfig/dnsflush." After this restart your computer and run league as admin and it should work! I hope this helps others because there hasn't been a sure fix issued from Riot about it. GLHF {{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}} {{champion:41}} 

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=clGi6TIedyM
i get perma ban withoun reason

After the update which took forever, game freezes after login. Tried rebooting PC, running as admin, etc. Nope, just freezes every time after I login and the home screen partially loads.

Hi all after updating patch 6.18 I tried to join a game of league and a bugsplat hit it would not let me play any games of league. I tried to reinstall league at 91% and unspecified error please check logs came up. I then fully reset my laptop to factory settings deleted my Antivirus turned off firewall and tried to reinstall yet again stopped at 99% 0 files scanned for over 5 hours. I've tired to delete lol air client etc I've tried everything on YouTube I've spent over 15 hours trying to sort this out so please can someone give me a legit solution thanks all:)

I currently have an issue with the 6.18 patch on my MacBook Pro.  I was wondering if I could get some guidance.  I update to 33% and the game begins to scan for differences in the files, capping out at about 800 files.  Next, an error appears stating that the update has failed.  I have checked my connection and it does not appear to be doing anything different.  Please help.

After patching the game it always crashes after the champ select and tells me i´m not connected to the internet. Firewall is not blocking lol, i made all the windows and graphic updates and the internet is working fine. iI play on windows 8.1 and i can load a bot game without any problems...It´s just always when i go into ranked and then i have the "great" leavebuster. Anyone with the same problem? Have a nice day.

Hello,

I got in to a game today, and after we entered the loading screen the game suddenly crashed and I had to restart it (this was directly after the resent patch update) I reconnected successfully after the restart and went through the loading screen and everything. But when I got into the game I found that the team has voted for a remake (I was in the game at this point) so we got defeated and redirected to the lobby. But the problem is it said in the lobby chat "You are ineligible to earn loot due to leaving or AFK behaviors." even though i didnt disconnect or leave on purpose the game just crashed and I was trying to reconnect and I did but it was in the final seconds so it was too late

Can someone please look into this and tell me if the punishment I received was well deserved or not?

Thank you very much for your time and effort reading through all this

Best regards"

Hello, I am not able to edit runes or masteries. The launcher says "unexpected error" every time I try to do so.

I was able to patch with no issue and I am able to get thru champion select and get into game with no issues. I am able to pick my runes or masteries out of the lists just fine, I am able to pick my skin and purchase items from the store just fine.

But I just can't seem to edit my runes or masteries. Is this a bigger issue or will I need to reinstall? (I don't wanna have to do that if I don't have to!)

THanks

my league client isn't launching after update of 6.18 (I think) patch. Patcher updated without problem but after clicking "LAUNCH", patcher closes and league's not starting, there are total of 4 processes in memory, those are LoL Patcher, LolClient and Riot Client Patcher and also PVP.net Patcher Kernel 
Ive tried to repair didnt work. Reinstall didnt work either.

Hey all,
I just reinstalled the game and am trying to patch, however I am getting literally (I'll take a pic if you want) 6kb/s...Its going to take an eternity to download almost a gb at that speed.
I have done an internet speed test and can get easily 10mb/s so it's not a problem at my end.
Cheers

Your network could be having trouble maintaining a strong connection, and it can usually be due to being on wireless or something else.  Check out the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide for a series of troubleshooting steps to strengthen your connection.  Hopefully your game is patched by now, but the guide can help towards a more permanent fix!

Patch 6.17= I can get past the launch screen to the login screen in less then the minute
Path 6.18= I can't even get to the login screen due to some reason, The repair button doesn't work either so please help

If the patcher doesn't show up after selecting the lol icon, then a setting with your OS could be blocking it.  Our [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide has a series of steps that should help with getting this fixed up.  Let me know if you still have any issues with this!

I am having an fps issues. It keeps the frames locked at 60 fps when in the past ive got up to 200+ frames. Ive already tried repairing the game and uninstalling and reinstalling so I would assume its an error with the new patch.

Patcher stops/errors out at 33% or below. Sometimes it stops before, never makes it past 33% though.
Had the same problem with 6.17, tried all the fixes but couldn't fix the problem, read I might need to just wait for the next patch. Got here and had the exact same issues.
The only things I have that I think would interupt is CCleaner, and an Anti-Malware program, but both of them don't have access to the RiotGames folder.. I also have ran into a problem trying to get .NET framework 3, but Im not sure how essential that might be considering i've downloaded, patched, and played league without it already. My  internet connection, was fine when I tested it on that website you guys recommended.
I have logs but I'm not sure which ones you guys want to see?

Hey NoTLOCKED, 

The patcher usually stops at 33% percent because it isn't able to collect the information it needs from the Servers. If you run through this [Connection Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) it should allow you to finish patching and get you back in game. 

If you continue to have issues after running through the steps in the guide feel free to reach out to me for help!

i dont know what happened but since about patch 6.16, whenever attempting to update, at random percentages and it says unspecified error check logs and retry... i would just restart my pc and relaunch league to update and would take a few tries but the update would come through. but at this patch, it doesent work. My KBps kept going from 1700 to 300 then would go down to 12 then to 300 then back to 12. then it shows that unspecified error message again. I uninstalled league hopping to be able to redownload it to the latest patch no problem but it sent the message again. Sometimes it would send a bugsplat thing. i filled it out multiple times. Ive tried to take off my firewall. it was off and it still did the same thing. idk what else i can do. i really love league and it would be such a shame of not being able to play it with my friends anymore. Does anybody have a suggestion for me to try? lol srry for being all over the place in this message. will be on tommorow to check for suggestions. Thanks so much!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Wow really Riot? You keep messing with champions that are not doing to great as it was prior to the beginning of this year and are making them even harder to use or just plain worthless  to ever use. Ashe was better , you are screwing with Shen, basically took a good character like poppy and made her less used. Really no classification for or any spot on any lane for Poppy. She is not a good top laner like before, and she cant support or jungle and you can forget mid. Last I heard you're planning on screwing with Galio which I play as my main and for what reason? I want the old Poppy back but with the new skin upgrades and animations you have kept play. The old shen was way better, the old ashe also back, and Fiora back ( that no one uses now thanks to these new worthless updates)plus leave my Galio main alone. Dont screw with a character that doesn't need it.
lmmao
